title: Creamy prawn linguine
ingredients: ['340g dry linguine pasta', '115g bacon', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '3 plum tomatoes, seeded and chopped', '50g spring onions, chopped', '250ml single cream', '4 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese', '4 tablespoons grated Monterey Jack cheese', '450g cooked prawns', '4 tablespoons toasted pine nuts']
